Object.Field: create table SNP_UFUNC ( I_UFUNC <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL, UFUNC_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> NOT NULL, I_PROJECT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, GROUP_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> NOT NULL, I_TXT_DEF <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL, I_TXT_DESC <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, FIRST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, FIRST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, LAST_DATE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_DATE")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, LAST_USER <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?> )
ALTER TABLE SNP_UFUNC ADD CONSTRAINT PK_SNP_UFUNC PRIMARY KEY (I_UFUNC)

create table SNP_UFUNC_IMPL ( I_UFUNC_IMPL <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL, I_UFUNC <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL, I_TXT_IMPL <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL )
ALTER TABLE SNP_UFUNC_IMPL ADD CONSTRAINT PK_SNP_UFUNC_IMP PRIMARY KEY (I_UFUNC_IMPL)
ALTER TABLE SNP_UFUNC ADD CONSTRAINT FK_SNP_UFUNC_IMP FOREIGN KEY (I_UFUNC) REFERENCES SNP_UFUNC (I_UFUNC)
create table SNP_UFUNC_TECHNO ( I_UFUNC_IMPL <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL, TECH_INT_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?> )
ALTER TABLE SNP_UFUNC_TECHNO ADD CONSTRAINT FK_SNP_UFUNC_TECH fOREIGN key (I_UFUNC_IMPL) REFERENCES SNP_UFUNC_IMPL (I_UFUNC_IMPL)
ALTER TABLE SNP_TXT_CROSSR ADD I_UFUNC <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> DEFAULT <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>
ALTER TABLE SNP_TXT_CROSSR ADD UFUNC_TECH_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> DEFAULT <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>
ALTER TABLE SNP_TXT_CROSSR ADD CONSTRAINT FK_TXT_CROSSR_UF FOREIGN KEY (I_UFUNC) REFERENCES SNP_UFUNC(I_UFUNC)
ALTER TABLE SNP_MODEL ADD IND_EVO_JDBC <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","1")?> DEFAULT <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>

create table SNP_FF_VALUEW ( FF_CODE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","35")?> NOT NULL, I_INSTANCE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL, I_OBJECTS <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> NOT NULL, NUM_VALUE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC","10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, SHORT_TXT_VALUE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR","250")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?> )
ALTER TABLE SNP_FF_VALUEW ADD CONSTRAINT PK_SNP_FF_VALUEW PRIMARY KEY (FF_CODE, I_INSTANCE)
